name: Coworking Space: Espaco Join in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Espaco Join
The working alternative to that of a disruptive home environment or a bustling and noisy cafe, Espaco Join will give you all of the infrastructure you require plus great surrounds to inspire you to get busy. Espaco Join are very adamant that you should not come here if you are looking for your own private room, as this is one place where it is sharing all the way. Attracting those who care to share from a diverse array of businesses from freelancers to startups, entrepreneurs and small businesses that like to spread themselves around, you will have a modern and comfy meeting room when you need a private moment or 2.

Located on the famous Oscar Freire Street next to the Subway Metro, the premises have 24-hour security plus reception and mail services to take advantage of. There is car parking in the vicinity and the Vanilla Café will look after your hunger pangs.

Coworking membership will give you an individual desk with plenty of room to spread your wings (aka your elbows) without hitting your neighbor, drawers to stash your personal goodies in and super fast wifi to connect to. A multifunctional printer is available for when you want to see words on paper and there is a fixed phone for each company. The venue is totally air conditioned and there is a stunning balcony to swan around for a breath of fresh air. If you need a quick meeting there is a dedicated table to chat at with a blackboard for scribbling on.

Add in plenty of coffee to keep the brain waves buzzing and you have nothing to stress out about whilst working.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Coworking Casa Vesper in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Coworking Casa Vesper
More than just a working space, Coworking Casa Vesper is a collaborative enclave with inspiring multifunctional environments. Sitting in a funky house from the 40's, it has been completely modernised and fitted out with all of the necessary technology to equip professionals and companies with just what they need to carry on business or to concentrate on a project in the 21st Century. Located only a 3-minute walk from Shopping Eldorado and an 8-minute walk from Metro Faria, it is easily accessible.

Coworking Casa Vesper offer hot spots, private rooms (can hold 2 to 15 people) and fully equipped meeting rooms with super fast Wi-Fi throughout the premises. There is also printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper. It is an "at home" experience with creative vibes where you will find baskets of fruit for nibbling purposes if you like to munch whilst you work and a Nespresso coffee machine, so that you can help yourself to as much caffeine as you like.

There are coaching and event rooms as well, that can be rented by the hour. Numerous events and workshops are organized where you can showoff your networking skills and your stunning smile.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Smart Place Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Smart Place Coworking
The coworking space that fosters the culture of entrepreneurship, collaboration and innovation, Smart Place is an innovative environment and easily accessed via public transport. Sitting only 350 meters from the Osasco train station, close to banks, schools, shopping malls and should you need it, hospitals, it is only 5 minutes from the Marginais and Castelo Branco Highway.

Here are some recent reviews about Smart place Coworking:

"Test day - a free day to know the place, the environment of harmony and union, the biodiversity of the coworkers and their businesses, the values in the real essence of collaboration as a true office must be, including personally meeting the owner and being part of a new family."

"Best place to have an office."

"If you are home working alone, away from everything and everyone, here is the blue ocean of the network."

"Organized space with excellent infrastructure - I recommend."

You can invade a private room when the occasion requires one, plug into Wi-Fi 300MB, swill loads of coffee and sit in air-conditioned comfort in Smart Place Coworking. Services offered for those willing to share at this coworking domain, include many perks. You will have full-on reception services so your guests or clients won't feel ignored, your own locker to stash your personal goodies in, printing facilities if you need to see words on paper plus IT support ranging from microcomputers to supplies and devices. There is a stationary store for your office supplies, consultants to call on for business advice and coaching gurus for those that want a helping hand.

The doors are open from 8am to 8pm Monday to Friday, from 9am to 1pm on Saturdays and Sundays are all yours to play or sleep.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: VIP Office Cidade Jardim in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of VIP Office Cidade Jardim
Another contemporary coworking space under the VIP Office conglomerate of coworking venues, VIP Office Cidade Jardim sits in Av. Paulista. It is another example of VIP Office's collaborative, connecting and engaging spaces for people to work from.

Smart, contemporary and urban in style, it is a "plug and play" enclave offering private office space where you will save money by reducing business costs in a shared economy and increase your efficiency as you only have to focus on your work; the day-to-day hassles of running an office are all looked after for you.

Attracting a diverse crowd from professional freelancers to startups and entrepreneurs as well as businesses, its community is dynamic and innovative. You will have super fast Internet to connect to plus all of the office gadgets that you could possibly need on hand. There are 2 modern meeting rooms that are fully equipped (think video conferencing, TV and a blackboard to scribble on) for when you want to have a private chat with a client or a brainstorming session with team players. You will be able to answer your calls from anywhere in the world with VIP Office IP Phone.

Training rooms are available for workshops and the common areas give you the space to have impromptu chats with cohorts, slurp on coffee or to vegetate when the brain is about to implode. The auditoriums are located in the Av. Paulista area near the metro with easy on-site parking and a capacity of up to 100 people. Coworking spaces vary from private rooms that can hold up to 4 people or large spaces that can accommodate up to 8 individuals. There are 4 stunning balconies to give you somewhere to run to for a breath of fresh air or a quiet contemplative moment in your own bubble.

If you wish to create a virtual office, VIP can look after it for you by providing all of the services that you will need.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Estação Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Estação Coworking
Hop in on our tram, train or simply ride with us. The house is open to anyone who believes in the power of ideas and of sharing what we know. Our space is located in the heart of the Vila Madalena neighborhood, and offers all the conditions and support services for your project. Lets reveal new ideas and better ways of working and living, building together a place capable of enabling them.

name: Coworking Space: Umb.co 23 - Coworking e Sala de Reunião in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Umb.co 23 - Coworking e Sala de Reunião
The doors are open from 8am to 7pm weekdays giving you the weekend to play up; Umb.co23 coworking is literally in a funky shed near the main avenues of Campinas.

Aimed at supporting and giving incentive to entrepreneurs, it is partnered with iAprendi that is focused on empowering women entrepreneurs in business and job creation as well as economic development. Sharing the same premises, it gives an extra depth for exchanging ideas, experiences and knowledge generating synergies for new projects, clients and suppliers.

A world of creativity and collaboration, coworking at Umb.co23 has membership plans to suit different needs from using the premises as a business address only, the occasional use of the meeting room or a fixed workstation in a shared office enclave.

It is a coworking world enhanced by its likeminded members from a diverse range of industries where you can foster ideas and possibilities or merely moan about the mistakes of everyday life, if that is your mood.

For those looking for a virtual office, the services include that of a secretary who will look after your telephone needs and receive correspondence on your behalf, for much less cost than a traditional secretary. The meeting room at Umb.co23 will hold up to 8 people in comfort or up to 15 in audiotorium format and is equipped with air-conditioning, fast wifi to plug into, a projector and plenty of complimentary drinking water to keep brains hydrated, as well as coffee for the caffeine addicts.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Estudio Capanema in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Estudio Capanema
A corporate coworking space catering to all sizes of companies from freelancers to multinationals, Estudio Capanema has private or shared rooms in Jardins, Itaim and Campo Belo as well as a coworking office in São Paulo. Predominantly it is a world of focused individuals in their 30s to their 45s that gather and huddle at Estudio Capanema all from a diverse range of backgrounds and industries creating a rich and enterprising dynamic space.

Focusing on helping businesses to grow, their motto is "to think big and be innovative". Membership plans are all inclusive so you will have no nasty surprises to send you crying to the bank at the end of each month.

Coworking stations come complete with speedy wifi, modern office furniture, meeting rooms for when you need a tete-a-tete or brain storming session and plenty of free parking. The caffeine addicts have been taken care of with heaps of fresh and hot coffee virtually on tap. Meeting rooms are pseudo home living rooms with a home theater available. The entire space is quiet, clean and ergonomic to bring out the best of you in your work.

If you need your own private office space, they are located in the heart of the best neighborhoods close to cafes, restaurants and commercial centers with plenty of public transport available. Each coworking office is well thought out with plenty of power outlets to recharge your gadgets.

There is internal TV circuit security with access control at the entrance, so you never have to worry about the bogeyman getting to your belongings. There are 2 sizes of work desk to choose from, drawers and lockers to stash your personal goodies in and a terrace to swan on when you need a breath of fresh air. There are secretarial services on hand to help with day-to-day dramas, clients, correspondence and meetings if need be.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: BUCC Work Spaces in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of BUCC Work Spaces
Founded in 2014, BUCC Work Spaces in Sao Paulo is a business unlocking and collaboration center for the coworking entrepreneur, startup or small business looking to share experiences or to grow and transform ideas into reality.

Some recent reviews on BUCC Work Spaces:

"Amazing environment, varied options of space, well solved common areas - as a large integrated garden - and super well located - there is a nearby train station - university city, bicycle track on the avenue in front of the house, near the pan square, shopping Villa-Lobos and Avenue Faria Lima."

"Tops. Excellent commercial environment in a very nice and green space."

"A place with an amazing and cozy decor. Service that surpasses expectations and a great location too."

BUCC is the acronym for Business Unlocking & Collaboration Center - business empowerment through a collaborative culture. This is where you can cowork as much or as little as you like, network with likeminded souls and let your ideas soar beyond your wildest imagination with a little help from your coworking cohorts. Relationships are fluid, the mentality is digital and there is a dynamic vibe permeating the venue.

You will find meeting rooms, private rooms, shared coworking spaces plus a private garden to mooch around when work gets too much and a cafe to swan around. For the really serious chill-out times, there is the Breeze Spa to indulge your body and soul.

Spaces are created with growth in mind no matter how large you grow if you are a startup and they are fully serviced. There is dedicated link plug and play Internet, all the necessary office gadgets you could need to play on including printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper. The on-site crew is bilingual so you won't have lost in translation moments if you need to call on their assistance. The cleaning fairies come in every night to ensure that the paper missile that missed the rubbish bin is picked up and for those without their own 4 wheels, there are plenty of bicycle racks to chain your bike to.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Delta Business Center in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Delta Business Center
Available at this exquisite and fully furnished business center is approximately 2,000m² of highly equipped and premium quality workspace solutions and private serviced office suites, including the top floor and the panoramic terrace with plenty of nature and an amazing view of the city and the surrounding region. Few offices can offer such a stunning and desirable feature, all set within one of the most highly sought-after corporate districts in the area. Also available is an auditorium, meeting rooms and training rooms, as well as a coffee shop and a great terrace and gardens, with an amazing view to São Paulo's most important landmark.

name: Coworking Space: Work Lounge in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Work Lounge
Located in one of the most developed areas of the city, the Vila Bella neighborhood of the East zone of Campinas, Work Lounge sits inside The Mall Campinas, a commercial gallery that offers free parking and has plenty of shops and cafes surrounding it. It is easily accessible via public transport and offers convenience, practicality and a lot of security.

Created with the objective of offering a flexible, safe, comfortable and highly functional space to stimulate and support the region's burgeoning gung ho souls involved in innovation and entrepreneurship, it attracts a diverse crowd to its doors from all walks of businesses. Think startups to professional freelancers, wandering nomads with laptops in tow as well as small businesses. Its coworking community is dynamic, creative and collaborative. There is no bureaucracy and no hassles about running an office on a day-to-day basis, as it is all taken care of for you.

Coworking membership plans are affordable as you can join by the day, the week or the month; whatever suits your work habits. You will have super fast Wi-Fi to connect to, a personal locker to stash your goodies in, a business address and of course, oodles of coffee to keep the caffeine addicts smiling all day. You can choose from the open workspace or a private room, if you want to float around in your own bubble of creativity.

Your coworking membership will include a number of hours of complimentary use of the meeting room for when you need a brainstorming session with team players or a client chat. It is fully equipped with a smart TV, chromecast, a flip chart and air conditioning.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: EC Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of EC Coworking
A collaborative coworking space, EC Coworking sitting in Sao Paulo is the perfect place for anyone looking for a space to work from, instead of going it alone in a disruptive home environment or trying to work in a boisterous cafe with a hissing espresso machine in your ear. Sitting near the Square Open Mall where you have everything from banking to dry cleaners, cafes and shops, it is easily accessible via public transport and there is convenient parking for those with their own 4 wheels.

Attracting a diverse crowd of workers to its doors from a wide range of business disciplines, this is where you can be independent and yet be a part of a dynamic community of innovative souls. From wandering nomads with laptops in tow to entrepreneurs, startups and small businesses, the community is interactive, collaborative and engaging.

Coworking membership fees are affordable and flexible to suit any budget without you having to worry about whether you can afford your dinner of seafood stew. You can grab a seat at a shared desk, plug into super fast Wi-Fi, have a private telephone and a business address.

For those that may be lacking in skills, there is professional coaching on hand and if you happen to be a caffeine addict, the complimentary coffee is non-stop all day.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Sharing Offices in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Sharing Offices
Sitting in a quiet street in Jundiai close to City Hall and only 1 km from the heart of the city, Sharing Offices is easily accessible via public transport and has plenty of parking for those with their own 4 wheels. This is where you can forget about the hassles of running your office from making sure there is ink in the printer to toilet paper in the loo, as everything is taken care of so that you can concentrate on your project or work.

Sharing Office is the perfect place to indulge in some networking with the dynamic cohorts that you will be surrounded by. From solo freelancers to entrepreneurs, startups and their teams to small businesses, it is a dynamic and innovative workspace. It is all about cooperation, interaction and connecting with likeminded people.
There are no long lease contracts, no initial investment and plenty of scope to work how and when you want to.

A professional environment, coworking at Sharing Offices will give you super fast Wi-Fi to connect to, reception services, a multifunctional printer to play on and you can get comfy at either a hot desk or a fixed desk. You will have your own personal locker to stash your goodies in and an ergonomic chair to keep your rear end happy. Memberships are offered on a part-time or permanent basis.

The meeting plus training room can hold up to 9 people (another one can hold up to 4 souls) and are fully equipped.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: OSHI Swiss Park in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of OSHI Swiss Park
Sitting on the banks of the Anhanguera Highway with quick access to the heart of the city and easily accessed via public transport, Oshi Swiss Park is another coworking venue under the umbrella of "Oshi" of which there are numerous dotted around Sao Paulo.

Oshi Swiss Park offers furnished coworking spaces, meeting rooms and a Virtual Office scenario, if that is what you wish to set up. Its dynamic community of likeminded souls include, wandering nomads with laptops in tow, professional local freelancers, startups and entrepreneurs as well as businesses to its doors that are open 24/7. There are plenty of opportunities to network with your cohorts on a daily basis over a cup of coffee.

Coworking services include access to a virtual secretary who will look after your customers, arrange meetings on your behalf or whatever else you may need to be done, especially if you decide to go on a holiday. You will have multimedia equipment at no extra cost from a flipchart to a blackboard, plus a projector to play with. The meeting rooms are decked out in swish style and are fully equipped with the necessary gadgets and equipment to ensure everything runs smoothly. It is the perfect space for workshops, lectures or presentation moments.

There are flexible coworking fee options to choose from, so that you can work how and when you want to. The costs will leave you plenty of cash left over to buy you and your dog dinner. There are membership plans for a solo coworker and plans available if you need space for a team or for a horde of employees. It is possible to adjust the number you are catering for if your business needs to downsize or upsize.

You will get to focus on your work or project, whilst Oshi's fantastic and friendly staff takes care of the rest. There are reception services on hand to serve you in a discrete and professional manner and the super fast and high capacity Wi-Fi is secure and will keep you connected, so that there are no unexpected surprises or disruptions.

There is also plenty of coffee to keep the brain waves buzzing.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: OSHI Petrolina in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of OSHI Petrolina
Another "Oshi" coworking premises, but this one is exclusively for the use of health professionals looking to be independent but within a dynamic community and those wanting to reduce business overheads by sharing resources.

Oshi Petrolina is a comfy and modern enclave with a huge waiting room for your clients and patients. It is easily accessed, as the venue sits in a privileged area in the medical center of Petrolina-PE, close to the main hospitals and laboratories of the city. You will have more time to care for your patients without worrying about bureaucracies and it is possible to take up residence here on an hourly, daily, weekly or monthly term. All of the various coworking packages are listed on their website for you to check out.

The venue offers coworking individuals an elevator so you don't have to run up stairs unless you want to, super fast Wi-Fi to keep you connected and plenty of coffee on tap to keep the caffeine addicts smiling. The modern facade of the building is discreet and identifies who is where and what their medical specialty is. There are shared spaces to work, meeting and training rooms that are fully equipped for when you need them, plus customer service offices. If you don't require a physical space but wish to have a tax domicile, the friendly team of Oshi will organize it for you.

For those wishing to create a website or have someone to host a website or look after their mail or media postings, this can also be arranged.

Oshi Petrolina is where you can take advantage of networking in a modern doctor's office shared with likeminded physicians.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Viveiro in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Viveiro
A beautiful space that will have design lovers sighing, Viveiro is also a functional and practical coworking space. Located in the funky area of Vila Madalena, it is easily reached by a 10-minute walk from the subway Vila Madalena. If you have your own 4 wheels there is parking in the area.

Sitting in a building entirely made of glass, on the corner of Wisard and Laboriosa streets, at the top of Vila Madalena, there are two floors dedicated to coworking with 40 workstations and a meeting room. You can swan around the terrace with incredible views of the city and the sunset, that is complete with a herbal nursery. On the ground floor, without any divisions there is room for workshops, meetings and events. From the flooring to the lighting, from consumption to waste management, everything is sustainable.

Coworking members have support services such as reception and access to packages which include accounting, administration, IT and design enthusiasts. The inspiring space has super fast Wi-Fi to plug into, plus all of the office infrastructure and gadgets that you could possibly need to get your stuff done. Fully equipped meeting rooms come in 2 sizes: one that can hold up 60 people that is perfect for courses, lectures and even yoga classes, whilst the other will accommodate up to 8 people in comfort for brainstorming sessions or client chats. It's a fun and collaborative space that will inspire you to great heights where you can swill as much amazing coffee as you want.

Within the vicinity behind a wall of graffiti is the Viveiro Cafe which is a collection point of innovative minds and souls who think outside of the box. Integrating work, city, life and art, there are 16 workstations and a meeting room for 6 people as well as a balcony with 360 degree views of Vila Madalena. The doors are always open welcoming coworking individuals into a space that is high-spirited and intense. Another option under the Viveiro umbrella is the Gallery with 16 workstations designed to create the ideal space for focus and innovations.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: WeWork in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of WeWork
This impressive work space comprises an entire 17-story building and is buzzing with creativity and connection. Each floor is filled with airy, bright lounges, large co-working areas, private office space, high-tech conference rooms, and living-room style break-out areas. After hours, take advantage of onsite event space and attend a networking happy hour. All business essentials are also included as standard from office supplies to personalised support. Friendly reception staff will greet your guests. Administrative support is available to help your working week run smoothly. Free-flowing micro-roasted coffee and fresh fruit water is available to keep you caffeinated and hydrated throughout the working day. Each detail has been considered so that you can focus on what matters: your business./
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: OSHI Apollo Center in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of OSHI Apollo Center
Oshi Apollo Center is another upmarket coworking venue under the conglomerate of "Oshi" that has spaces dotted around Sao Paulo. This one is strategically located in the main business avenue of the city near banks, restaurants, schools and hospitals.

Offering fully furnished coworking spaces, meeting rooms and a Virtual Office scenario if that is what you wish to set up, Oshi's dynamic community of likeminded souls include wandering nomads with laptops in tow, professional local freelancers, startups and entrepreneurs, as well as businesses from a diverse range of business disciplines to its doors.

Coworking members have access to amazing services including a virtual secretary who will look after your customers, arrange meetings on your behalf or whatever else you may need to be done. You will have multimedia equipment at no extra cost from a flipchart to a blackboard plus a projector to play with. The meeting rooms are decked out in style and are fully equipped with the necessary gadgets and equipment to ensure that your event runs smoothly. It is the perfect space for workshops, lectures or presentation moments.

There are numerous flexible coworking options to choose from, so that you can work how and when you want to. You can find plans for a solo coworker or packages if you need space for a team or for the masses if you have a lot of employees to worry about. It is possible to adjust the number you are catering for if your business needs to downsize or upsize. The costs will leave you plenty of cash left over to indulge in a sugar high gorging on brigadeiros (aka chocolate truffle balls).

Coworking at Oshi lets you focus on your work or project, whilst the incredible Oshi team takes care of the rest. There are reception services on hand to serve you in a discrete and professional manner. The super fast and high capacity Wi-Fi is secure and will keep you connected so that there are no unexpected surprises or disruptions.

There is plenty of coffee to keep the brain waves buzzing and the caffeine addicts smiling.

name: Coworking Space: 2Work in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of 2Work
Located on Avenida Paulista on the corner of Avenida Brigadeiro Luiz Antônio, 2Work is an advanced coworking venue with a corporate environment. A company that offers shared offices and coworking spaces, it is only a few meters from the subway sitting in the main economic, financial and business center of Sao Paulo. The venue is surrounded by cinemas, theaters, shopping malls and fantastic cafes and restaurants.

Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, there are numerous coworking membership plans to choose from to fit how and when you wish to work. The dynamic community is a mixture of professional freelancers, entrepreneurs and startups, as well as small to medium sized companies representing a vast array of business industries.

Coworking members have receptionist services during business hours and a personalized telephone service if required. The work stations are large and the meeting and training rooms are complete with TVs and ergonomic furniture. There is dedicated fiber optic links with really fast transfer speeds (exceeds 50 Mbits of download and 30 Mbits of upload) to speed up your life and keep you connected. You will have your own personal locker to safely stash your goodies, plus access to office gadgets such as printing to keep you smiling.

Fees for coworking souls are based on hours of work either full-time or part-time, but if you don't find a plan that suits you, one can be tailored to your needs such as what services you require from address and correspondence management to having your own phone line. Virtual office packages are also on offer with various services attached.

2Work have 2 properties, one in Sao Paulo and the other in Campinas, so you will have the versatility of being able to work at either space without changing the cost of your plan.
SHOW MORE

name: Coworking Space: Coworking Consolação in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Coworking Consolação
Sitting close to Consolação Street, Paulista Avenue and Downtown São Paulo, Coworking Consolação is easily accessible by public transport and surrounded by banks, parking lots, restaurants, a post office and both public and private companies.

It is a shared office environment that offers all of the infrastructure you will need to carry on your business without having the stress of running your own office space.

Aimed primarily at the corporate ilk, small businesses and professional individuals, Coworking Consolação has stunning panoramic views over Consolação for when you need those moments to stare out a window in contemplation mode. You will have the best technology to play with such as super fast wifi and communications as well as personalized services. There is scanning and printing machines to play on, legal and accounting advice on hand, plus a motoboy to run your errands. The space is modern with clean lines and uncluttered. The gourmet coffee is always hot for the caffeine addicts and plenty of drinking water is available for those not into the hard stuff.

You will be able to take over a private room if you like to float in your own bubble flying solo, or you can share a workstation and huddle as you work with your cohorts. The private rooms are capable of holding up to 6 people if you have a team to accommodate.

There is a coworking community of innovative souls to mingle and collaborate with from a diverse range of industries and plenty of opportunities to show-off your networking skills, share an experience or exchange ideas.

Coworking Consolação is perfect for market integration and cost reduction.

name: Coworking Space: VIP Office Berrini in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of VIP Office Berrini
The perfect solution for anyone looking for a space to set up their laptop and get to work, VIP Office Berrini is another coworking venue under the umbrella of VIP Office. With premises littered all over Sao Paulo, VIP Office has created the perfect venues with state-of-the-art infrastructure. Another "plug and play" space, it offers private office space where you will save money by reducing business costs in a shared economy and increase your efficiency, as you only have to focus on your work. The day-to-day hassles of running an office are all looked after for you.

Located in the region of Av. Berrini, the premises attract a diverse crowd from professional freelancers to startups and entrepreneurs, as well as businesses. Its community is dynamic and innovative. Coworking spaces are limited to 3 per room, so you won't have to worry about sitting on your neighbor's lap or there are private rooms on offer.

You will have super fast Internet to connect to plus all of the office gadgets that you could possibly need on hand. There are modern meeting rooms that are fully equipped (think video conferencing, TV and a blackboard to scribble on) for when you want to have a private chat with a client or a brainstorming session with team players that can accommodate 6 to 15 people respectively. You will be able to answer your calls from anywhere in the world with VIP Office IP Phone.

Training rooms are available for workshops and the common areas give you the space to have impromptu chats with cohorts, slurp on coffee or to vegetate when the brain is about to implode. The auditoriums are located in the Av. Berrini area with easy on-site parking and a capacity of up to 100 people. If you wish to create a virtual office, VIP can look after it for you by providing all of the services that you will need.

There is an on-site cafe for when the hunger pangs attack or if you are in the habit of sipping espresso all day long.

description:
Overview of VIP Office Barra Funda
VIP Office does it again with another fabulous coworking venue, Barra Funda, joining the other enclaves dotted around Sao Paulo under their burgeoning umbrella. Another "plug and play" space of infinite urban style, VIP Office Paradise offers private office space where you will save money by reducing business costs in a shared economy and where you can increase your efficiency, as you only have to focus on your work. There are modern and stylish meeting rooms fully equipped (think video conferencing, TV and a blackboard to scribble on) for when you want to have a private chat with a client or a brainstorming session with team players.

name: Coworking Space: CoPro Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of CoPro Coworking
Promoting and lending credibility to your business, the upmarket address of CoPro Coworking will give you an edge above the rest. Sitting in São Paulo, Rua Oscar Freire, in a duplex penthouse of stunning architectural design, you will also have the advantage of 24-hour security and car parking if you have your own 4 wheels. For those that have to use foot power (aka walking) the venue is only 50m from the subway Sumaré, Green Line, with easy access to the main business centers of São Paulo.

The premises have balconies surrounding the office space with a large living area on the incredible rooftop terrace overlooking the South Zone of São Paulo. It is close to the Paulista, Rebouças, Consolação, Henrique Schaumann, Brooklin and Vila Olímpia avenues. Done out in an industrial look with a corporate office style, you will have plenty of power outlets to recharge your gadgets, drawers to stash your goodies in and large tables so you won't be sitting on your neighbor's lap.

A collaborative space, this is where self-employed professionals, startups, entrepreneurs, consultants and companies choose to work. CoPro Coworking is a part of the Projetti Inovatti Group, who specialize in projects and business.
You will be able to focus on your project or work without any hassles of running an office. The community is a diverse mix of business disciplines from architects to lawyers, engineers to journalists and everything in between.

Coworking members have ergonomic furniture to keep them feeling great whilst working and the meeting rooms are fully equipped for videoconferencing, teleconferencing. There is also a training room to invade when you want to hold a workshop. You will have administrative support, the receptionist will answer phone calls and handle mail or you can have your own dedicated telephone line if you wish. Internet access is via a high speed internet connection, with a redundant link and connected to a UPS system. There are printing and scanning facilities to play on if you need to see words on paper.

For those that may need a bit of advice or help in bringing their dream idea into the real world, there are professional consultants on hand to advise in relation to business planning, legal and tax implications, project planning and communication and marketing strategies.

Coworking membership plans are flexible and affordable with the doors being open 24 hours a day 7 days a week to keep the workaholics smiling.

Training rooms are available for workshops and the common areas give you the space to have impromptu chats with cohorts, slurp on coffee or to vegetate when the brain is about to implode. With plenty of organized events and workshops, you will have many opportunities to rub shoulders with your cohorts or show-off your networking skills.

Members' perks include a pool to splash in, printers for when you want to see words on paper, lockers to stash your personal goodies in and a recreation area for when you need time out.

The meeting room can accommodate up to 10 individuals whilst the shared coworking space can hold up to 30 people at any one time. The total enclave is comfy with quality infrastructure in place to give you the perfect environment to get creative, collaborate and develop your idea into a reality.

For those looking for that perfect space to host an event, the gourmet space can be your space for that special occasion with its large swimming pool and barbecue complete with all utensils, refrigerator, stove, tables, chairs, a gazebo for hammocks, a dressing room with a shower and high speed internet.

name: Coworking Space: Casa de Viver in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Casa de Viver
The doors are open from 8am to 5.30pm Monday to Friday at Casa de Viver that was created in 2015. It was the first coworking space in Brazil where mums and dads can work with their children around them. Created out of necessity to cater for those who wish to work but not to leave their kids, Casa de Viver is where you can be close to your kids whilst you tap away on your laptop, working without fragmenting your life and leaving aside what is important, your kids. This is where working and family is not compartmentalized.

The venue is easily accessible, as it is only 500 meters from Santa Cruz subway station and there are plenty of buses to get you there running on the Rua Domingos de Morais line. A welcoming space overflowing with warmth and friendly faces, you will be able to network and build bonds with likeminded individuals where growth and empowerment is for everyone. A bustling coworking venue you will have meetings to art workshops, physical activities to coaching groups, plus study groups to happy hours in which to mingle.

You get to work upstairs and your children will be downstairs with specialized caregivers creating a unique support network for personal and professional growth, whilst nurturing the family unit. You will have fast wifi to plug into, telephones, cabinets to store your goodies in and plenty of office benches for work purposes. There is a kitchen to whip up a snack in and a great terrace area to relax on with or without your kids in tow. For the coworker there is a meeting room for when you need privacy that can accommodate up to 6 individuals at any one time decked out with a monitor for presentations, a white board, access to wifi plus views of the terrace.

The children's space is carefully set out so that they can play and develop fully and safely with separate areas for different ages from babies to toddlers. Free play is actively encouraged and it is easy for you to run and grab a cuddle whenever you feel so inclined. If you find yourself in need of a helping hand, there is a service room where you will have access to professionals such as psychologists, coaches, nutritionists and therapists.

name: Coworking Space: Santos Offices Centro in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Santos Offices Centro
Santos Offices are spreading their venues around offering fantastic facilities and dynamic communities to mingle and network with.

This is another coworking venue under the umbrella of Santos Office, strategically located close to main shopping areas, business domains and administrative centers with plenty of public transport available. Santos Office Centro is next to the Anhangabaú Subway Station and Light Shopping Mall and only 300 meters from the City Hall.

A corporate space with a pleasant and modern environment, it attracts a diverse array of coworkers from all walks of life - think along the lines of wandering nomads with laptops in tow, innovative entrepreneurs and startups thinking outside of the box. From professional freelancers to local businesses, Santos Office Centro has a space suitable for everyone. Offering coworking members individually air-conditioned rooms with private Internet networks, digital telephony that will be answered with the name of your company with your own greeting, meeting rooms with television and video conference equipment, laser printers/scanners/copiers plus much more, there is no excuse to be a sloth.

Single coworking workstations allow different entrepreneurs to share the same environment, whilst still being able to make new business connections. Each workstation is at least 1.20m long and 0.60m wide with individual drawers (yes you have heaps of room to flap your wings without hitting your neighbor), a telephone and private locker to store your personal goodies in. If you work in a team but want to keep your business costs on the low side, this is the perfect alternative. There are rooms for 1 to 10 people with private access and you will have your own key if your want to set yourselves apart from the hoi poloi.

The coworking meeting rooms can hold between 4 and 15 people with individual air conditioning, their own telephone extension or conference telephone, access points to the internal Internet network and Wi-Fi, a teleconferencing system and TVs from 32 "to 46" for presentations. The sound system is amazing and the coffee is endless. There is also a fully equipped auditorium which can hold up to 50 people for lectures, seminars, workshops or whatever.

There is no bureaucracy to navigate and no office day-to-day infrastructure to worry about. Santos Office Centro gives you shared offices, coworking workstations, meeting rooms and scretarial services you can avail yourself of, as well as being able to create a virtual office, if that is all you need.

Check out their website for their affordable and flexible coworking rates.

There is no initial investment and you won't have the bureaucracy of leasing a traditional space. Your office will be installed quickly and you won't be responsible for the expenses connected with water, energy and the rest of the costs. You will have the benefits of daily cleaning, yummy coffee, internet with a dedicated link and redundancy wired with wi-fi and password access and printing services. There is
24-hour security through the concierge in the building and monitoring by strategic cameras in the common areas of the building and on the floor. Your business address will be in a prestigious location and you will have 24 hour access. Some buildings have underground parking for those with their own 4 wheels and all have access to a meeting room.

If an office is not for you, coworking souls can have a fixed coworking space in an open area with a number of meeting room hours allocated each month. You will have your own personal locker to stash your goodies in.

name: Coworking Space: Lab 48 Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Lab 48 Coworking
An innovative space where people help each other, interact, exchange experiences, do business and develop their businesses. Lab 48 Coworking lets you avoid the sloth syndrom of working from home in isolation or the hissing espresso machine ear drum ache from working in a cafe. You will be able to mingle with a dynamic community of professionals from different backgrounds and niche markets in a space that becomes an exchange area for ideas and experiences.

You will be able to work hand in hand with a group of writers, architects, designers and developers to get that project launched, you will be able to quickly assemble a team to meet the needs of a new business, you will build and expand your professional network and you will be able to reduce the cost of your fixed overheads. Positivity literally flows throughout the workspace giving you a creative edge and a zest for working.

Coworking membership fees are affordable and flexible to suit how and when you want to work. You can take your pick from sitting (or standing at your desk) in the open shared space or swanning around your own private room. There is super fast Wi-Fi to keep you connected and printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper. Throw in a video game lounge area, a deck in the fresh air and gourmet coffee to stave off the caffeine shakes and you have the perfect space to work from.

Only one block from Avenue Paulista and within close proximity to the metro Paraiso,

description:
Overview of Espaço Certo

name: Coworking Space: Cubo Network in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Cubo Network
Where do you go to find startups, investors and mentors in Brazil? Well nowhere literally.

Until.

Along cameCubo

Cubo was born out of a three-pronged collaboration from Pripas, the São Paulo-based Internet entrepreneur and CEO of Bitinvest; Brazil's largest bank, Itaú Unibanco; and Redpoint e.ventures—a partnership between Menlo Park-headquartered Redpoint Ventures and San Francisco's e.ventures.

 It marks the kickstart of an innovative and collaborative ecosystem of the entreprenuerial market in Latin America. It's a haven for everything that happens in the Brazilian startups world - and trust us its a piece of action you want to be a part of.

As a 5,000m² space in Vila Olimpia, you get 3-stories of co-working area, 1 floor dedicated entirely to workshops and training and an amphitheater fit for 130 people. And of course a rooftop and terrace lounge - the only legit way to enjoy Brazilian coffee!

They offer mentorships and entrepreneurial education for digital start-ups and entrepreneurs who need a little nudge to take their ideas further.

 Needless to say, it's deffo a (huge) space worth checking out if you're into these kinda stuff and as they always say in the startup world "you put a bunch of like-minded smart people in a room and just wait for the BOOM' Okay well we totally made that up but you gota' agree.

name: Coworking Space: Legal Space Coworking - Coworking Unit Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Legal Space Coworking - Coworking Unit Sao Paulo
Unit Sao Paulo is another venue under the umbrella of "Legal Space Coworking" where you can walk in and set up your own space as your office. You can get your stuff done without worrying about any bureaucratic hassles happening or whether there is ink in the printer, as the mundane office chores are looked after by the friendly crew. Sitting in the Minas Gerais region of Belo Horizonte, this is the place to engage, collaborate and interact with innovative cohorts.

Attracting a diverse array of interesting souls from local freelancers to startups, entrepreneurs and small businesses to its doors, there are plenty of opportunities to network with your cohorts on a daily basis. There are consultants on hand to give you business advice whether it is legal, tax or business planning. Coworking membership plans are totally affordable and flexible, so that you can work how and when you want to.

Unit Sao Paulo offers style and comfort with technology and personalized services, as well as operational support. You will have ergonomic furniture to keep you comfy, a living space to vegetate in when your brain is about to implode and plenty of fun moments networking with your new best business friends.

Coworking members have super fast Wi-Fi to plug into, printing facilities for when words on paper are necessary, a personalised telephone service, mail management and convenient services such as a motoboy and there is a post office on site. A meeting slash training room for educational and corporate events, classes and conferences is available.

If you wish to create a virtual office there are plans to cover this, offering all of the services to look after your business for you.

name: Coworking Space: Santos Offices The Blue in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Santos Offices The Blue
Strategically located to be close to main shopping areas, business domains and administrative centers with plenty of public transport available, Santos Offices are spreading their coworking spaces around. The Blue is only one venue under their umbrella with fantastic facilities and dynamic communities to mingle and network with. It sits near the neighborhoods of Gonzaga, Boqueirão and Vila Rica.

A corporate space with a pleasant and modern environment, it attracts a diverse array of coworkers from all walks of life - think along the lines of wandering nomads with laptops in tow, innovative entrepreneurs and inventive startups. From professional freelancers to local businesses, The Blue has created a space suitable for everyone. Offering coworking members individually air-conditioned rooms with private Internet networks, digital telephony prepared to answer with the name of your company with your own greeting, meeting rooms with television and video conference equipment, laser printers/scanners/copiers plus much more, there is no excuse not to get your work done.

Single coworking workstations allow different entrepreneurs to share the same environment, whilst still being able to mingle with peers. Each workstation is at least 1.20m long and 0.60m wide with individual drawers (yes you have heaps of room to flap your wings without hitting your neighbor), telephone, chair and private locker to store your personal goodies in. If you work in a team but want to keep your business costs on the low side, this is the perfect alternative. There are private rooms for 1 to 10 people and you will have your own key, if your want to set yourselves apart from the hoi poloi.

The coworking meeting rooms can hold between 4 and 15 people with individual air conditioning, their own telephone extension or conference telephone, access points to the internal Internet network and Wi-Fi, a teleconferencing system and TVs from 32 "to 46" for presentations. The sound system is amazing and the coffee is endless. There is also a fully equipped auditorium which can hold up to 50 people for lectures, seminars, workshops or whatever.

There is no bureaucracy to navigate and no office day-to-day infrastructure to worry about. The Blue gives you shared offices, coworking workstations, meeting rooms and scretarial services you can avail yourself of, as well as being able to create a virtual office if that is all you need.

name: Coworking Space: Alpha Cowork in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Alpha Cowork
The largest shared office venue in Campinas, Alpha Cowork has easy access to the main districts of Campinas and to the Dom Pedro Highway. Its location is close to local businesses, such as a bakery, banks, post office, restaurants, gyms and other places that provide total practicality in the day to day life of a coworker.

Attracting a diverse group to its doors from local professional freelancers to small businesses, startups and entrepreneurs, Alpha Cowork even has a wake-up service to get you out of bed. The community is made up of communication agencies, coaching professionals, headhunters, translators, programmers, architects and lawyers, plus seasonal workers who may just happen to be in the vicinity.

An inspiring enclave with a buzzing vibe, coworking members have plenty of opportunity to mingle and network at one of the many organized events, workshops or lectures.

Coworking fees are flexible and affordable, so you should check out their website to get the complete story on this. You will have super fast wifi to connnect to, printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper, personal lockers to stash your goodies in and 24-hour secure parking for those that have their own 4 wheels. The entire premises are air-conditioned, so you won't get hot under the collar and there is a completely fitted out kitchen to whip up a snack in when the hunger pangs attack. Coworkers have access to the auditorium that can accommodate up to 40 people for workshops or presentation moments.

There is amazing coffee to keep the caffeine addicts smiling all day long.

name: Coworking Space: Urban Cowork in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Urban Cowork
Urban Cowork sits in the heart of Guarulhos and has its doors open from 8am to 9pm weekdays, with the weekends all yours to do as you please, whether it be recharging your batteries having a long sleep-in or playing up with your new besties who sit beside you in the shared space.

Here you can choose from a workspace in a shared domain or a private room, so you can bumble around in your own bubble or accommodate a small team of players. There is a meeting room perfect for networking events or training sessions that can hold up to 30 individuals and business consultancy plus mentoring is on hand if you want it. For those that have their own 4 wheels to get around, there is plenty of parking available at Urban Coworking.

You will have super fast Wi-Fi to plug into, 2 fully equipped meeting rooms for brainstorming sessions or client meetings, a lounge for chill-out moments where you will find games such as ping pong or if you want to release some aggro you can throw darts at a board. There is a stunning terrace area to swan around for some fresh air or if you want to hold an event.

Coworking at Urban Cowork will give you monthly mentoring sessions of the business variety plus a discount on legal or accounting advice. No bogeymen can get into the premises as the venue has security and there is a kitchen to whip up a snack when the stomach rumbles take over from the brainwaves, or if you need a caffeine shot.

name: Coworking Space: Coworking Sabia in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Coworking Sabia
A stimulating environment where you will find shared workstations, private rooms, a meeting room and an auditorium, Coworking Sabia in Sao Paulo offers the lot to keep you happily working, whilst they take care of the rest, such as ink in the printer and toilet paper in the loo.

Coworking Sabia attracts those who wish to change the way they work, who want a collaborative space and the opportunities to make new business connections as well as those who wish to cut the costs of their business overheads. Its community is diverse from freelancing souls to startups, entrepreneurs to local businesses. This is where you can combine professionalism with high spirits in a vibrant space.

Coworking members get to work in a cozy and uncluttered area that is functional and efficient, with an informal vibe and super fast Internet to plug into. There are printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper and plenty of coffee to keep the brain waves buzzing. The entrance has a gallery, library and reception with a guest waiting room. Its coworking area has 14 work stations with custom-made tables and ergonomic chairs. The 4 private rooms can accommodate 2 to 6 people and the fully equipped meeting room is large enough for 10 individuals. The auditorium that is perfect for workshops, training sessions, lectures or events has a capacity of 50 people.

Coworking membership plans allow you to work how and when you want. They are affordable and flexible.

name: Coworking Space: Studio Vector in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Studio Vector
Studio Vector's purpose is to be a meeting point for the exchange of academic and professional experiences targeting consultants, teachers, professionals and students in the areas of Social Sciences, Architecture and Urbanism, Engineering and Design,
who seek improvement and innovation.

Coworking members get to choose from an array of fee schedules. You can work in the mornings or afternoons only, or go for the whole day if you have a lot to do. There are individual workstations, fixed or shared. The doors are open from 7am to 10 pm Monday to Friday and 7am to 7pm Saturday, giving you Sunday to chase your dog in the park or to mooch around in a daze at home.

The coworking venue has state-of-the-art air conditioning throughout to keep you from getting hot under the collar, Internet access (Vivo Fibra) via Wi-Fi, 2 bathrooms so you don't have to queue and plenty of coffee to keep the caffeine addicts smiling.
Extra services can be taken advantage of in the form of secretarial and receptionist services, using the address as your fiscal business address, computer rental if you forget your laptop, printing services and website creation and maintenance. There is plenty of car parking available for those that have their own 4 wheels.

The fully equipped meeting rooms are perfect for workshops, training sessions or lectures and can accommodate up to 15 people.

name: Coworking Space: WorkUp Solutions in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of WorkUp Solutions
Workup Solutions is the coworking venue for those smart thinkers who wish to reduce their overhead business costs, who are over working from a disruptive home environment or a noisy cafe scene with a hissing espresso machine in their ear. The space is creative and open enough to encourage serendipity moments happening between its coworkers.

Everyone is welcome here, from freelancing locals to wandering nomads with laptops in tow, startups and entrepreneurs as well as small businesses. It is the venue to boost your networking skills and to maximize your business.

Offering an unbeatable membership rate and plenty of perks and benefits, Workup Solutions has great infrastructure so that you can concentrate on your project and not have to worry about whether there is ink in the printer. Sitting only 200 meters from the Trianon-Masp do Metro station at Av. Paulista; it is easily accessible via public transport and close to cafes, shops and other amenities that you may need.

Coworking members have access from 8am to 9pm Monday to Friday, giving you the weekend off to run around a park with your dog or to mooch around in a daze at home.

name: Coworking Space: UP2U Coworking in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of UP2U Coworking
The mission of UP2U Coworking is to provide a collaborative and professional workspace to develop your business, where you can serve your customers and focus on personal development. The first coworking space in Alphaville, this is where you can take care of your business and let the on-site crew of UP2U take care of the mundane office chores for you.

A collaborative workspace that attracts professional individuals from all walks of life and a diverse range of industries, from locals to wandering souls, you will have likeminded people to network with, collaborate and share knowledge. You will have a workstation, meeting rooms to invade, a business address and mailbox if required plus all of the office gadgets that you could possibly need to play with.

A coworking venue to stimulate exchange, there is super fast Wi-Fi to plug into, printing facilities, ergonomic furniture to keep your body happy and multilingual staff so there are no lost in translation moments to be had (English, Spanish and Portuguese). You will have your own individual keyed locker to stash your goodies in and plenty of coffee to keep the caffeine addicts smiling.

Sitting amidst a plethora of cafes and restaurants, the venue is located near the main thoroughfares of Alphaville and for those that like to pedal a bicycle there are plenty of bike racks available. Attracting professional freelancers, web designers, consultants and developers, this is a hub of activity and connectivity.

Memberships are flexible to suit your work needs such as part time from 9am to 1pm, full time 9am to 6pm or one for the night owls of 6pm to 10pm.

name: Coworking Space: Locus Jardins in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Locus Jardins
Created in 2017 as an expansion step by the coworking conglomerate "Locus", Locus Jardins opened to meet the demands of customers seeking more options of privileged locations in Sao Paulo. Aiming to provide immediate solutions with low cost and risk to companies, professionals and entrepreneurs, Locus Jardins oozes the same sophistication and functionality as its sister properties dotted throughout Sao Paulo. Encouraging and supporting entrepreneurship as a way of life and a way to achieve personal and financial fulfillment, Locus know that it is hard to start out.

Here you will find coworking spaces where you can spread your wings, you will be able to create a virtual office, rent a private office and take advantage of the meeting rooms on offer. Having your office on Av. Paulista will increase your professional image and business credibility.

Coworking members will have a workstation in a relaxed space and the opportunity to meet people from the most diverse areas of business. You will easily be able to enhance and increase your networking on a daily basis. You will have everything you need to get your work done from speedy Internet to printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper. There is a telephone in each shared workstation and plenty of coffee to keep the brain waves happening. Check out their website for the membership fee plans as they are affordable and flexible.

Fully furnished commercial offices have all the advantages of a physical office, without having to face the overhead expenses. Locus takes care of everything from reception services to cleaning, photo copying and stationery, so that you can focus on your work or project. Comfy offices range in size and include administrative support such as reception and telephone service, cleaning, stationery, post office and printing facilities.

The creation of a virtual office will allow you to work from wherever you wish to and give you the services of a remote secretary with personalized and exclusive service as well as a fiscal address to use. Coworking membership fees for a virtual office are varied and it would be wise to check out their website to find out which one suits you.

Fully equipped meeting rooms can be hired by the hour for business presentations, workshops or lectures and they are private with easy access.

name: Coworking Space: Link 2U Coworking and Offices in Sao Paulo
description:
Overview of Link 2U Coworking and Offices
Offering flexible and intelligent solutions with state-of-the-art infrastructure, comfort and quality at a low cost, Link 2U Coworkind and Offices looks after everything so that you can concentrate on your project or work.

Attracting a diverse group of individuals and businesses to its doors, from professional freelancers to startups, entrepreneurs and local companies, it is the space to connect, engage and collaborate.

The doors are open 24 hours a day so that the workaholics will keep smiling and not have to worry about switching off the lights. Link 2U offers shared coworking spaces, private offices, a meeting room and the services to create a virtual office. Coworking membership plans are flexible and affordable so that you can work how and when you want to. It is the venue where you can grow and expand your business in an ideal location for easy accessibility.

Coworking at Link2U will give you your own workstation with enough room to flap you wings without hitting your neighbor, high speed Internet to keep you connected, printing facilities for when you want to see words on paper, access to the meeting room for private chats or brainstorming sessions with team players, as well as support from the Link2U team. Private offices are complete with comfy furniture, personalized telephone services (your own telephone line) and access to the meeting and training room. There is high speed Internet via cable network and Wi-Fi plus cleaning fairies come in at night to pick up the misguided paper missiles that missed the rubbish bin during the day's hard toil.

Virtual office creation fees will give you all of the necessary services that you need as well as a fiscal address for your business, correspondence administration and use of the meeting room when required. The meeting room is fully equipped with TV LCD 42″, a blackboard or flip chart and complimentary water and coffee to keep you and your guests hydrated.

You will have plenty of opportunities to network with your interesting and innovative cohorts to broaden your business connections at organized events, there is a magazine stand where you can grab something to read, a kitchen to run to when the hunger pangs strike, a motorcycle courier for quick deliveries, plus a stationery store with basic materials for convenience.
